portfolio.title: Space tourism multi-page website
portfolio.discription: This project is a fun collaboration with Scrimba and Kevin Powell! If you like, you can follow along and watch Kevin complete the project on Scrimba. Lots to learn!

portfolio.title: Manage landing page
portfolio.discription: This challenge will be a great test for your responsive skills. There are lots of small details and slight content shifts for different screen sizes.

portfolio.title: Room homepage
portfolio.discription: This small homepage challenge packs a big punch to test your layout skills. There's also a slider in there to add a JS layer for extra practice.

portfolio.title: Interactive card details form
portfolio.discription: This fun project will be an excellent way to practice DOM manipulation and form validation while also putting your HTML and CSS skills to the test.

portfolio.title: Todo app
portfolio.discription: The classic todo app with a few twists! This app includes a dark/light theme toggle and drag & drop reordering for anyone wanting an extra test.

portfolio.title: Age calculator app
portfolio.discription: This challenge is designed to sharpen your JavaScript and form validation skills. Working with dates in JavaScript can be tricky, so this will be a nice test!

portfolio.title: Bookmark landing page
portfolio.discription: This challenge will really test your layout skills. There are also areas that will require some JavaScript, such as the tabbed features section and the FAQ accordion.

portfolio.title: Multi-step form
portfolio.discription: An excellent test for your form-building and JS skills, this project will pose many challenges along the way to completion.
